entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning and early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Local smoke. Wind east 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High 18. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local smoke. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming light overnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023
